abcd21:TechnicalContact.abcd21:Name: Gabi Droege
abcd21:TechnicalContact.abcd21:Address: Botanic Garden and Botanical Museum Berlin-Dahlem, Königin-Luise-Str.6-8, 14195 Berlin, Germany

abcd21:ContentContact.abcd21:Name: Petra Hajkova; Barbora Zemanova
abcd21:ContentContact.abcd21:Address: External Research Facility, Institute of Vertebrate Biology, The Czech Academy of Sciences, Studenec 122, 675 02 Konesin, Czech Republic

abcd21:Representation.abcd21:Title: Genetic Bank of the Institute of Vertebrate Biology
abcd21:Representation.abcd21:Details: The Genetic Bank of the Institute of Vertebrate Biology, The Czech Academy of Sciences (IVB) holds currently a collection of ca. 5000 animal tissue samples available for genomic research. The collection is constantly growing, focusing mainly on central European vertebrate fauna. Since 2015 the bank is part of the Global Genome Biodiversity Network.

abcd21:Representation.abcd21:Text: Institute of Vertebrate Biology, The Czech Academy of Sciences (IVB CAS)

abcd21:Addresses.abcd21:Address: IVB CAS Headquarters: Kvetna 8, CZ-603 65 Brno, Czech Republic; IVB CAS Genetic Bank: External Research Facility, IVB CAS, Studenec 122, CZ-675 02 Konesin, Czech Republic

HTTP parameter 'request' used for building the request.
Try to get CMF for namespace http://www.tdwg.org/schemas/abcd/2.1
Executing SQL: 'SELECT DISTINCT tissues.ID_Collection FROM wrapper_view_specimens AS tissues ORDER BY tissues.ID_Collection LIMIT 2'

Executing SQL: 'SELECT tissues.ID_Collection, metadata.TechnicalContactName, metadata.TechnicalContactEmail, metadata.TechnicalContactAddress, metadata.ContentContactName, metadata.ContentContactEmail, metadata.ContentContactAddress, metadata.DatasetTitle, metadata.DatasetDetails, metadata.OwnerLogoURI, metadata.DateModified, metadata.OwnerOrganizationName, metadata.OwnerAddress, metadata.OwnerEmail, metadata.OwnerURI, metadata.CopyrightText, metadata.TermsOfUseText, metadata.CitationsText, tissues.InstitutionCode_Specimen, tissues.CollectionCode_Specimen, tissues.UnitID_Specimen, sptoolhighertaxon.HigherTaxon, sptoolhighertaxon.TaxonRank, sptooltaxa.NameAuthorYear, sptooltaxa.PreferredFlag, sptooltaxa.Identifier, sptooltaxa.IdentificationDate, tissues.BasisOfRecord, tissues.KindOfUnit, tissues.Blocked_For_Loaning, tissues.AcquiredFrom, tissues.PreparationType, tissues.PreparationDate, tissues.Locality_ID, tissues.CollectionDateMin, tissues.CollectionDateMax, tissues.Collectors, tissues.ExpeditionDetails, tissues.Locality, tissues.CountryName, tissues.CountryISO2, tissues.ContinentOrOcean, tissues.LongitudeDecimal, tissues.LatitudeDecimal, tissues.AltitudeMin, tissues.AltitudeMax, tissues.AltitudeUnit, tissues.DepthMin, tissues.DepthMax, tissues.DepthUnit, tissues.Habitat, tissues.CollectorsNo, tissues.Sex, metadata.MetadataID, tissues.ID_Collection, sptoolhighertaxon.ID_HigherTaxon, sptooltaxa.ID_TaxonIdentified FROM abcdmetadataspecimens AS metadata, wrapper_view_specimens AS tissues LEFT JOIN sptooltaxa AS sptooltaxa ON (sptooltaxa.FK_Collection = tissues.ID_Collection) LEFT JOIN sptoolhighertaxon AS sptoolhighertaxon ON (sptoolhighertaxon.FK_TaxonIdentified = sptooltaxa.ID_TaxonIdentified) WHERE (tissues.ID_Collection IN (14704)) ORDER BY tissues.ID_Collection'
